descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Spectral Daedra follower. You can find him in the Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood) or The Bee and Barb (Riften). The location depends on the file you choose to download. 

Extract the file(s) and place them file in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data 

Or use the Nexus Download Manager.

If you\'re using an older version please update. The newest version will fix some bugs with the spells. 

Translations: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24813 GERMAN
author: Skyes666
